name: Jellyville
description:
While the industry is booming, the environment is doomed. Pollution, too much population finally makes the world unsuitable for living. Human beings finally decided to abandon the earth and take a spacecraft to the deep space. After they left completely, the power of wildness reconquered the world. Ruins of civilization were completely buried under the sand and weeds.

A long, long time has passed, a group of Jelly walk out the ruins, they will become the new master of this planet!

You, the leader of these Jellies, must lead them to overcome any difficulties, and survive this new earth!

Game Features
- Tons of different buildings. Manage your worker wisely.
- Complex crafting system. Arm yourself with what humans left.
- Explore the world, uncover the history before departure.
- Fight the enemy, challenge strong creatures in this wild world.
